pr_title: Add jakarta version of activation-api to Jaeger extension

timeline.bodyText: I am missing smth here does Jaeger 0.34.x use this?

replies.bodyText: The javax version is part of the dependencies and has been excluded in the first PR. It's just bringing it back the Jakarta equivalent.
replies.author: gsmet
